name: SAM PLAYGROUND 0.95b
description:
You are a little toy soldier owned by an evil AI called SAM. Try to survive as long as you can, but the fate of all SAM's toys is inevitable...

SAM PLAYGROUND is a small game developed in a couple of weeks inspired by those arcade games and FPS of the 90s.

This is a small project made for a college assignment, where only a specific set of assets could be used.
